command.name: quit
command.description: Quit to main menu.

command.name: pause
command.description: Pause the game.

command.name: cameraMoveLeft
command.description: Move the camera to the left (free camera mode).

command.name: cameraMoveRight
command.description: Move the camera to the right (free camera mode).

command.name: cameraMoveUp
command.description: Move the camera upwards (free camera mode).

command.name: cameraMoveDown
command.description: Move the camera downwards (free camera mode).

command.name: cameraMoveForward
command.description: Move the camera forward (free camera mode).

command.name: cameraMoveBackward
command.description: Move the camera backward (free camera mode).

command.name: cameraTurnLeft
command.description: Turn the camera to the left.

command.name: cameraTurnRight
command.description: Turn the camera to the right.

command.name: cameraTurnUp
command.description: Turn the camera upwards.

command.name: cameraTurnDown
command.description: Turn the camera downwards.

command.name: followNext
command.description: Follow next spacecraft.

command.name: followPrevious
command.description: Follow previous spacecraft.

command.name: changeView
command.description: Change view of currently followed spacecraft.

command.name: setManualControl
command.description: Switch the control of the currently followed spacecraft to manual.

command.name: changeFlightMode
command.description: Toggle the controlled spacecraft between free and compensated flight modes.

command.name: fire
command.description: Fire the weapons of the manually controlled spacecraft.

command.name: forward
command.description: Forward thrust (free mode) or increase speed (compensated mode).

command.name: reverse
command.description: Reverse thrust (free mode) or decrease speed (compensated mode).

command.name: resetSpeed
command.description: Reset speed to zero (compensated mode).

command.name: yawLeft
command.description: Turn spacecraft to the left.

command.name: yawRight
command.description: Turn spacecraft to the right.

command.name: pitchUp
command.description: Turn spacecraft upwards.

command.name: pitchDown
command.description: Turn spacecraft downwards.

command.name: rollLeft
command.description: Roll spacecraft to the left.

command.name: rollRight
command.description: Roll spacecraft to the right.

command.name: toggleLightRotation
command.description: Toggle rotation of directional light.

command.name: setAIControl
command.description: Switch the control of the currently followed spacecraft to AI.

command.name: stopAIShips
command.description: Delete the goals of AI controlled spacecrafts and make all of them stop.

command.name: toggleHitboxVisibility
command.description: Toggle the visibility of hitboxes.

command.name: cameraDecreaseFOV
command.description: Zoom in. (decrease field of view of current camera)

command.name: cameraIncreaseFOV
command.description: Zoom out. (increase field of view of current camera)
